titleStmt.title: The memoires of the life, and rare adventures of Henrietta Silvia Moliere as they have been very lately published in French : with remarks.
Mémoires de la vie de Henriette-Sylvie de Molière. English
titleStmt.author: Villedieu, Madame de, d. 1683.
Subligny, sieur de, ca. 1640-ca. 1679.

notesStmt.note: A novel, many scenes of which are based on incidents in the life of Armande Bejart.
Translation of: Mémoires de la vie de Henriette-Sylvie de Molière.
Part 2 has a separate t.p. with imprint: London : Printed by J.C. for W. Crooke, 1677.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
